Set of tools for calculating energy efficiency in industrial equipment

FanEnergyIndex.h
1 #ifndef AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_FANENERGYINDEX_H
2 #define AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_FANENERGYINDEX_H
3 
4 #include <cmath>
5 
6 class FanEnergyIndex {
7 public:
16  FanEnergyIndex(const double flowRate, const double inletPressure, const double outletPressure, const double airDensity,
17  const double motorPower)
18  : flowRate(flowRate), inletPressure(inletPressure), outletPressure(outletPressure), airDensity(airDensity),
19  motorPower(motorPower)
20  {}
21 
26  double calculateEnergyIndex() {
27  const double pressure = outletPressure - inletPressure;
28  const double referencePower = (flowRate + 250) * (pressure + 0.4 * (airDensity / 0.075)) / (6343 * 0.66);
29  const double kWreferencePower = referencePower * 0.7457;
30  const double efficiency1 = 0.96 * std::pow(referencePower / (referencePower + 2.2), 0.05);
31  double efficiency2 = 0.962;
32  if (kWreferencePower < 185) {
33  efficiency2 = -0.003812 * std::pow(std::log10(kWreferencePower), 4) +
34  0.025834 * std::pow(std::log10(kWreferencePower), 3) +
35  -0.072577 * std::pow(std::log10(kWreferencePower), 2) +
36  0.125559 * std::log10(kWreferencePower) + 0.850274;
37  }
38 
39  return (kWreferencePower * (1 / efficiency1) * (1 / efficiency2)) / motorPower;
40  }
41 
42 private:
43  const double flowRate, inletPressure, outletPressure, airDensity, motorPower;
44 };
45 
46 #endif //AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_FANENERGYINDEX_H
